display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.

**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=kXIJ0ji68UwQ7kNvwEyrvWN&_nc_oc=Adk9MKg-oYs-jtVqfJAZn9giQnGzViN9d3tR603-zUDYXWgaPhvxmJ9GF1HPSkiP4o0J0k5q2sRfsFLG6OXFJQl-&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=04V7OmPbA_tfaO1kXatZfA&oh=00_AfLR4EJby5WEX4Ti2thWmJOyQdQSVdIpjFtO9Q931d8BZw&oe=682467DD)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=r4giYs2oEkMQ7kNvwEh4NnY&_nc_oc=AdkZYrBvyKOPIMTmW6UJesd9gcftS7qKi_bIexS4Q2fl0OlAYhLjXYDMNzBgOdwukb2h_niNm8pGMs_ZSycPUCvw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=04V7OmPbA_tfaO1kXatZfA&oh=00_AfLUDT5EezTmqlVJNnGzfxZUvRHAAgKREIUuqMnwpzCoEw&oe=68244992)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
